title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience a delegation of German Parliamentarians (Bundestag)

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience a delegation of German Parliamentarians (Bundestag) led by H.E Rouenhoff Stefan on 27th May, 2024.
The visit was aimed at interfacing with Nigerian policy makers to strengthen relations that would foster economic growth and development, create job opportunities, as well as identify new areas of cooperation.
